plot: The all-female, bash-em-up sport of Roller Derby has had its renaissance in Australia, and it's changing the lives of two young women.
title: Grind Girls
plot_es: The all-female, bash-em-up sport of Roller Derby has had its renaissance in Australia, and it's changing the lives of two young women.
plot_en: The all-female, bash-em-up sport of Roller Derby has had its renaissance in Australia, and it's changing the lives of two young women.
